title: How to Make a Chilli Pepper Garden Spray

steps.headline: Pulse the ingredients in a food processor.
steps.description: Alternatively, chop up the ingredients and leave together in a bowl.

steps.headline: Allow the processed or chopped mixture to sit for 24 hours.
Add soapy water to make the spray liquid component.
steps.description: Pour into a spray bottle set aside for this purpose.

steps.headline: Spray weekly.
steps.description: You should notice a positive difference quickly.

text: Pulse the ingredients in a food processor. Alternatively, chop up the ingredients and leave together in a bowl. Allow the processed or chopped mixture to sit for 24 hours.  Add soapy water to make the spray liquid component. Pour into a spray bottle set aside for this purpose. Spray weekly. You should notice a positive difference quickly.
